summary: MY VEHICLE STARTED FLASHING THE AIRBAG LIGHT ANY TIME I WOULD TURN RIGHT, NOW IT STAYS ON AT ALL TIMES. WHEN CALLING MY LOCAL DEALER, I WAS INFORMED THAT THEY SELL NEARLY 20 CLOCK SPRINGS OF THE SAME PART NUMBER A WEEK. IF THIS MANY OF THE SAME PART IS BEING SOLD, CLEARLY THERE IS AN ISSUE WITH THE ORIGINAL PART.
